body_html:
Same error with pytorch 0.4.1:

conda create -n caffe2py35 python=3.5
source activate caffe2py35
conda install -c caffe2 caffe2
conda install -c conda-forge onnx
conda install -c pytorch pytorch

import torch
from caffe2.python import core

WARNING:root:This caffe2 python run does not have GPU support. Will run in CPU only mode.
CRITICAL:root:Cannot load caffe2.python. Error: dlopen(/Users/aidas/miniconda2/envs/caffe2py35/lib/python3.6/site-packages/caffe2/python/caffe2_pybind11_state.cpython-36m-darwin.so, 10): Symbol not found: __ZN3fLB27FLAGS_caffe2_keep_on_shrinkE
  Referenced from: /Users/aidas/miniconda2/envs/caffe2py35/lib/python3.6/site-packages/caffe2/python/caffe2_pybind11_state.cpython-36m-darwin.so
  Expected in: /Users/aidas/miniconda2/envs/caffe2py35/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/lib/libcaffe2.dylib
 in /Users/aidas/miniconda2/envs/caffe2py35/lib/python3.6/site-packages/caffe2/python/caffe2_pybind11_state.cpython-36m-darwin.so

Works with 4.0.0 conda install -c pytorch pytorch==0.4.0

body:
Same error with pytorch 0.4.1:
```
conda create -n caffe2py35 python=3.5
source activate caffe2py35
conda install -c caffe2 caffe2
conda install -c conda-forge onnx
conda install -c pytorch pytorch
```

```
import torch
from caffe2.python import core
```
```
WARNING:root:This caffe2 python run does not have GPU support. Will run in CPU only mode.
CRITICAL:root:Cannot load caffe2.python. Error: dlopen(/Users/aidas/miniconda2/envs/caffe2py35/lib/python3.6/site-packages/caffe2/python/caffe2_pybind11_state.cpython-36m-darwin.so, 10): Symbol not found: __ZN3fLB27FLAGS_caffe2_keep_on_shrinkE
  Referenced from: /Users/aidas/miniconda2/envs/caffe2py35/lib/python3.6/site-packages/caffe2/python/caffe2_pybind11_state.cpython-36m-darwin.so
  Expected in: /Users/aidas/miniconda2/envs/caffe2py35/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/lib/libcaffe2.dylib
 in /Users/aidas/miniconda2/envs/caffe2py35/lib/python3.6/site-packages/caffe2/python/caffe2_pybind11_state.cpython-36m-darwin.so
```

Works with 4.0.0 `conda install -c pytorch pytorch==0.4.0`
